T02TD3387E:55a-1: badzra sram kha l'a s'a dha nam /
T02TD3387E:55a-3: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD3387E:55b-0: rdo rje lcags @55b sgrog ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3387E:55b-1: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la h'um ljang gu'i yi ge las nges par rdzogs pa'i rdo rje lcags sgrog ma zhal gsum phyag drug ma /
T02TD3387E:55b-2: sngon po dang dkar po ni g-yas dang /
T02TD3387E:55b-4: zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum mo //
T02TD3387E:55b-5: rdo rje dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /
T02TD3387E:55b-6: mda' ni g-yas kyi phyag gsum na'o //
T02TD3387E:55b-9: gzhu ni g-yon gyi phyag gsum na'o /
T02TD3387E:55b-10: mdog ljang ser zhal cung zhig bzhad pa /
T02TD3387E:55b-11: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3387E:55b-12: gdug pa can gyi sems can 'dul ba'i bdag nyid dbu bsams la /
T02TD3387E:55b-13: phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD3387E:55b-14: de la lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcings nas //
T02TD3387E:55b-15: mthe'u chung dang sdigs mdzub gnyis lcags sgrog gi rnam pa can du bcing bar bya ba ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD3387E:55b-17: aom badzra sri kham le h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes bya'o //
T02TD3387E:55b-18: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
T02TD3387E:55b-19: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
T02TD3387E:55b-20: khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//
